txt.en: Mâramit can be found at Tilmakhím, to the south of Tâkhdar.\n\nAsk Mâramit for more traps to place in order to capture pests. Hármelak will pay her later.
'Have you spoken with Mâramit? I would not wish to wait long, lest those pests in Tâkhdar learn of our plans to ensnare them. I jest, of course, but the sooner the better to keep my people safe.'
Tilmakhím is to the south of Tâkhdar.\n\nLay the traps in various locations around Tilmakhím.
Set traps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Mâramit can be found at Tilmakhím, to the south of Tâkhdar.\n\nSpeak with Mâramit and inform her the traps have been laid. She will want you to deliver a message to Hármelak to receive payment for her services.
Traps set ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Do not forget to speak with me once you have finished setting all your traps! I must trust that you will convey my message to Hármelak regarding my payment.'
Spoke with Mâramit
Speak with Mâramit
'Has Mâramit asked payment for her services? Bring me the exact amount, and I will be sure to thank her for her discretion most handsomely.'

'You are finished with your task? Excellent. I will guess Hármelak wishes our exchange to be kept our little secret, no? I am accustomed to such matters in my trade. I just sell the things; what you do with them matters naught to me.\n\n'Tell Hármelak I will not expect payment this once, but I would like my generosity remembered next time any guards might want to poke their noses where they do not belong. Say this nicely, please!'
Tilmakhím is to the south of Tâkhdar.\n\nHármelak has asked you to acquire more traps from Mâramit to ensnare more pests in Tâkhdar.
Return to Hármelak
'Do not forget to tell Hármelak I appreciate her wisdom! Make sure you mention how reasonable and generous my business is, as well.'

'You return from Takhdâr. Then you faced no difficulty in setting my traps for those pests? I knew you would not disappoint.

'Mâramit is a most beloved ally of mine. She has naught to fear from me, although I do find her magnanimous gesture touching. I thank you for sharing her kind words with me.

'As before, I appreciate your delicacy and discretion in keeping our city safe. I do not think these pests will trouble us any longer.'
Traps received

'Your assistance in discovering those dangerous traps was most welcome, [placeholder]. I have been made aware of the true source of these pests, and I require your assistance once more.\n\n'I assume you recall Mâramit, a purveyor of traps in Tilmakhím? Inform her you are my messenger, and that I will pay her well once she has given you more traps to place in these areas I will mark for you. She will not hesitate to comply, I am certain.'
Return to Hármelak
Ask Mâramit for more traps

'Welcome back to my lovely little shop! Did you forget something? Or did you miss me?\n\n'Ah, Hármelak sent you this time. She has kept her word with me before. Yes, I will give you even more of my wares. Come see me again when you are finished setting the traps and we will discuss further, you and I.'
Hármelak is waiting in Dâr Laja.\n\nReturn to Hármelak to convey Mâramit's good wishes, and inform her the traps have been set.
The Trappings of Nobility
